docs.title: vizelec
docs.text:
A python application to create visualization based on electronic-related files (verilog, spice, ...).

This is still a work in progress.

docs.title: As a module
docs.text:
Create a new env, then add the module

pip install git+https://github.com/Patarimi/vizelec.git

Documentation can be found here.

docs.title: Canvas
docs.text: This page provides documentation for our command line tools.

docs.title: canvas
docs.text:
Usage:

 [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --install-completion [bash|zsh|fish|powershell|pwsh]
                                  Install completion for the specified shell.
  --show-completion [bash|zsh|fish|powershell|pwsh]
                                  Show completion for the specified shell, to
                                  copy it or customize the installation.

docs.title: draw-canvas
docs.text:
Usage:

 draw-canvas [OPTIONS] N_WELL_N N_WELL_P FINGER H_WELL_N H_WELL_P

Options:

  N_WELL_N  [required]
  N_WELL_P  [required]
  FINGER    [required]
  H_WELL_N  [required]
  H_WELL_P  [required]

docs.title: vizelec
docs.text:
Usage:

 [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:

  --install-completion [bash|zsh|fish|powershell|pwsh]
                                  Install completion for the specified shell.
  --show-completion [bash|zsh|fish|powershell|pwsh]
                                  Show completion for the specified shell, to

docs.title: load
docs.text:
Create a graph representation of the schematic given by schem. :param schem: path to a spice file. :param show: display the netlist as a graph

Usage:

 spice load [OPTIONS] SCHEM

Options:

  SCHEM               [required]
  --show / --no-show  [default: show]
